content: electrode & voltorb are approximately 7 5cm tall and 7 5cm in width weight 50grams each this includes all materials used to make each pokemon 2mm hook stylecraft special dk in white and claret for electrode and fondant and white for voltorb black embroidery floss white felt polyester toy filling pins to place pieces before sewing together darning needle stitch markers i prefer using scrap yarn as stitch markers
